T02D3543:181a-1: p'i ta barna pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3543:181a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sku mdog ser mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3543:181a-4: 'phags ma she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3543:181a-5: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas aa yig las skyes
T02D3543:181a-6: pa'i zla ba la dh'i:yig ser po las skyes pa'i
T02D3543:181a-7: sna tshogs padma la ham yig ser po la aa
T02D3543:181b-0: yig la sogs pa'i @181b dbyings bcu drug gis yongs
T02D3543:181b-1: su bskor zhing gnas pa'i phyi rol du ka yig
T02D3543:181b-2: la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
T02D3543:181b-3: yongs su bskor ba bsgom par bya'o /
T02D3543:181b-11: dri ma zhes pa'i rnal 'byor ma brgyad do //
T02D3543:181b-12: de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las ye shes
T02D3543:181b-13: kyi zla ba shar ba 'od rab tu gsal ba'o
T02D3543:181b-15: de'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pusti /
T02D3543:181b-16: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la de'i steng du pusti gnyis pa'o //
T02D3543:181b-17: de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan
T02D3543:181b-18: 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma
T02D3543:181b-19: sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma de
T02D3543:181b-20: bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dbu rgyan can /
T02D3543:181b-21: chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa //
T02D3543:181b-22: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la bzhugs pa na bza' dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3543:181b-23: g-yas g-yon gyi logs dag na autpa la la gnas
T02D3543:181b-24: pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pu
T02D3543:181b-27: dpral bar aom yig ser po /
T02D3543:181b-30: lte bar h'um yig nag po zhes bzlas pa'i dus
T02D3543:181b-31: su yi ge bzhi po rnams kyi rjes su bsam
